description:

DJ is allowed to worship Lorelei for the day but he's indebted as an office slave to me for a month. Mistress Lorelei plays DJ so expertly that I was even turned on behind the camera. She uses the entire day for one big tease and denial extravaganza for the ULTIMATE cock tease! You have NEVER seen Mistress Lorelei Lee so sexy and you have never seen her deny a cock quite like this.
One is left thinking if DJ had wished to just keep his mouth shut. Truth is we all know Mistress Lorelei's power controls him and he couldn't help himself. Boot worship, humiliation, CBT, strap-on ass fucking, ass and pussy worship and wicked tease and denial are all included.
title: The Ultimate Cock Tease
